questions.question_text:
DreamHouse Realty wants to offer a form on its Experience Cloud site where inspectors will submit findings from a property inspection.
Which feature should an administrator place on the page to fulfill this requirement?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
I also choose D. Here is my reason why.
Screen Flow allows you to create a custom form with various fields and screens that users can interact with to submit information. This is ideal for collecting detailed information such as inspection findings directly from the Experience Cloud site.

Option C: Record Detail: Displays details of a specific record but does not provide a custom form for data entry.

Selected Answer: D
Option D is the correct one in my opinion.

questions.question_text:
The sales team at Ursa Major Solar has asked the administrator to automate an outbound message.
What should the administrator utilize to satisfy the request?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
It is B, cannot send outbound messages using process builder
I think it should be B

- Aand B. Create a new queue and add Cases as an available object**: Since tasks and cases are different objects, creating a new queue specifically for cases allows the team to manage case assignments separately. This ensures clear organization and dedicated handling for cases.

A & C. 
D could be considered if the assignment process requires more complex logic

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers (UC) has a queue that is used for managing tasks that need to be worked by the UC customer support team. The same team will now be working some of UC's Cases.
Which two options should the administrator use to help the support team? (Choose two.)

choices.C: Add Cases to the existing queue as available object.
choices.B: Create a new queue and add Cases as an available object.
choices.A: Use assignment rules to set the queue as the owner of the case.
choices.D: Configure a flow to assign the cases to the queue.

questions.question_text: What data loss considerations should an administrator keep in mind when changing a custom field type from Text to Picklist? (Choose two.)

choices.B: There will be no data loss with use of a global value set.
choices.D: Assignment and escalation rules may be affected.
choices.C: Any list view based on the custom field is deleted.
choices.A: Auto updates will be made to Visualforce references to prevent data loss.

questions.question_text:
Marketing users at Cloud Kicks should be able to view and edit converted leads. The administrator has assigned them a permission set with the View and Edit Converted Leads permission.
Which two ways can the marketing users now access converted leads for editing? (Choose two.)

choices.B: Search the Recent Records component on the homepage.
choices.D: Find them in the global search results.
choices.A: Utilize a list view where lead status equals Qualified.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
Should be A & D
